name: collect-winter-with-friends
description:
Hey it is my first time release itch game, and first game jam, cheers!

In this game, you need to Cooperate with your friends ( or your another hand ) to collect snowflake, it's not that easy. And you might stuck in competing with your friends, what a prisoner's dilemma！

You can control player one by WASD, and your friend use Arrow key to control player two. The goal is to collect more snowflakes, first to finish wins.

Hope you enjoy this game!
